thread.title: netfabb and Microsoft on the 3MF 3D Printing Consortium
thread.title_full: netfabb and Microsoft on the 3MF 3D Printing Consortium

title: netfabb and Microsoft on the 3MF 3D Printing Consortium
text:
Expand Earlier this year, a consortium of leading names in the 3D printing industry united to put forward a brand new, information-rich file format for 3D printing - 3MF . Since then the collective has grown to include partners such as 3D Systems, Materialise, Autodesk, HP, Dassault Systemes and many more hoping to bridge the gap between modern additive technologies and 'oudated' file formats. 
In this TCT Show + Personalize 2015 Conference presentation, Alexander Oster, CEO of netfabb and Adrian Lannin, Group Programme Manager for Microsoft , provide us with an update on this important project. 
To keep up-to-date on all the latest videos from TCT Show make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel . Tags
